term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - partial isotherm (or individual isotherm), in surface chemistry
term.title: partial isotherm

item.text: The function relating, at constant temperature and pressure, the amount of a particular component in the interfacial layer per unit area (or per unit mass of adsorbent) with its mole fraction (or concentration) in the liquid phase. This function can be evaluated only when the location and the thickness of the interfacial layer have been defined.
